properties.title: Säntispark Abtwil
properties.abstract: So much to choose from in one place. Water activities, wellness, fitness, sports and play - Säntispark in Abtwil near St. Gallen offers all this and more.
properties.description:
Water fun for young and old: The 110-metre wild water canyon with rapids, eddies and two water carousels is great fun! In addition, visitors can enjoy the wave pool with an impressive fountain and thundering surf, and the 90-metre water slide also offers a breathtaking experience. Treat yourself to the relaxing saltwater pool with bubble zones and massage jets. Daily water gymnastics and (high-tech) single solariums round off the health services.

The popular Säntispark sauna is well known as an exceptional facility. Complementing the sauna village is a beautiful sauna garden with a natural pond and a sauna on piles – the ideal combination for an unforgettable sauna experience.

In May 2009 the Säntispark wellness island opened its doors. Here our guests can let themselves go in the luxurious surroundings. And in a relaxed atmosphere they can savour something that is often lacking in daily life: time - time for body, mind and soul. Säntispark makes it easy to find that feeling of well-being.
